name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyberpunk Girl: Futuristic Style in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into a futuristic world with a cyberpunk girl theme, featuring neon visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in a futuristic cityscape with neon lights and cyberpunk aesthetics in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Explore a vibrant cyberpunk world with glowing neon lights and a futuristic vibe.
Minimalist Design: A sleek and modern interface inspired by cyberpunk aesthetics for seamless browsing.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance within the neon-lit theme.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with futuristic ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add unique features to elevate your browsing experience with a cyberpunk twist.
